marklogic.body: Here's one trivia on amino acids that a lot of people don't know is true (which, for me, is hard to believe): amino acids and proteins, when they are not used as building blocks, get converted into glycogen or, worse, fatty acids, and contribute to weight Gain. (Check the page in your biochemistry book that summarizes all the cycles and processes - the one you memorized for the boards - and you'll trace the pathway there!)
